Game.Name: Naxat Stadium (Japan)
Game.plot: Naxat Stadium is a Sports game, developed by Sting and published by Naxat Soft,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: Fight Hidden TeamsAt the title screen, chose "1P Mode", pick Team "X". When it asks you to enter a password, enter one of the following to go against a hidden team:Cheat: Fight Hidden TeamsAt the Pennant Mode password screen, enter the following:
Game.Notes: Naxat Stadium is a baseball game unique to the PC Engine. It superficially models itself on Namco's Family Stadium (Famista) series of baseball sims, presenting a similar vein of comedy and super deformed athletes. The game uses fictional teams which are known only by their initial letters, and the player has some control over the configuration of their teams before starting. The game features a single-player pennant mode, a two-player competitive mode and a "watch mode" that allows the player to observe two CPU teams play against each other.
